title: Innovative Instructional Design for AI-Based Mathematics Learning: Gamification, Collaboration, and Online Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: As part of a vocational training institution’s math-to-employment linkage program, strengthening competencies in utilizing AI tools to solve real workplace problems.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex mathematical problems with 80% accuracy using AI-based math problem-solving tools (e.g., Wolfram Alpha, GeoGebra)
Learners achieve peer assessment scores of 4 out of 5 points or higher while performing collaborative problem-solving tasks on a game-based learning platform
Learners can record weekly learning logs and write self-reflection reports in an online Learning Management System (LMS)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
